6. **Discrediting opponents**: Attacking the credibility or character of opponents can be an effective way to undermine their viewpoints, but it can also be used to distract from the actual issues at hand.
7. **Creating fake news or propaganda outlets**: Creating fake news or propaganda outlets can be used to spread misinformation and create the illusion of widespread support for a particular viewpoint.
